programme.title: Satanic Verses outcry
programme.short_synopsis: Book stores return book to public display after initial removal.
programme.medium_synopsis: Stores accused of bowing to Iranian edict, but there are still fears for book store staffs' safety.
programme.long_synopsis:
Stores accused of bowing to Iranian edict, but there are still fears for book store staffs' safety.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
